subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Gareth Bale and Mesut Özil both shone with their new squads Saturday, but neither player would have started but for their willingness to risk their health and clubs’ urgency to get them on the field.
snippet: Gareth Bale and Mesut Özil both shone with their new squads Saturday, but neither player would have started but for their willingness to risk their health and clubs’ urgency to get them on the field.
